definition: a small thin sharp bit or wood or glass or metal, break up into splinters or slivers
details:
noun
- a small thin sharp bit or wood or glass or metal
= example: a small thin sharp bit or wood or glass or metal
= synonyms: sliver
verb
- break up into splinters or slivers
= example: break up into splinters or slivers
= synonyms: sliver
- divide into slivers or splinters
= synonyms: sliver
- withdraw from an organization or communion
= synonyms: break away, secede
